snippet: From being the bores of the last two World Cups, Switzerland could be one of the draws of the 2014 tournament as retiring coach Ottmar Hitzfeld puts his faith in an exciting younger generation in Brazil....

headline.print_headline: Switzerland: From Bores to Draws at the World Cup
headline.main: Switzerland: From Bores to Draws at the World Cup

lead_paragraph: From being the bores of the last two World Cups, Switzerland could be one of the draws of the 2014 tournament as retiring coach Ottmar Hitzfeld puts his faith in an exciting younger generation in Brazil.
